content: _"Man shrinks at odor, but smiles at beauty, which is only natural. Once hidden inside the Buddha's head, this treasure has a secret yet to be revealed"_.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Skandha_of_Form.md', within the main section titled 'Skandha of Form'.
The content is as follows:
_"Man shrinks at odor, but smiles at beauty, which is only natural. Once hidden inside the Buddha's head, this treasure has a secret yet to be revealed"_.
